claims.object: Increase in the anteroposterior diameter of the rib cage during respiration due to the movement of ribs

surface_layer.definition: The pump handle movement of ribs refers to the increase in the anteroposterior diameter of the rib cage during respiration due to rib movement.

deep_layer.mechanism: Ribs move like a pump handle, increasing the volume of the thoracic cavity.

epistemic_metadata.source: Pump Handle Movement of Ribs: Biomechanics, Anatomy ...
